1118913159396560897.text: 9/ Here's a link to the landscape: https://www.wavegp.com/research-data-download … It's not pretty, but hopefully it's useful. I'm sure there are many mistakes, so if you work for any of these protocols and have any changes to recommend, please let me know.

1118913158171824129.text: 8/ Finally, competition between smart contract platforms is heating up: https://twitter.com/ameensol/status/1116361514531704832?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed&ref_url=http%3A%2F%2Fboards.messari.io%2Fboard%2F2d7fe93595e73d8e9125478fd764b9eb09750ca4c321d63c85f8e7802c1e42f8 … Protocols have limited tools at their disposal to compete & investments / grants can help set them apart.

1118913157043453952.text: 7/ Third, ecosystem financing is a key part of treasury management, an important governance challenge that has been in the spotlight lately cc: @Shaughnessy119https://twitter.com/Shaughnessy119/status/1116449686997610500 …

1118913156024360965.text: 6/ Second, the AUM across all crypto funds declined in tandem with cryptoasset prices and capital is now more concentrated among increasingly hard to reach venture funds that are overwhelmed with deals.

1118913154967146496.text: 5/ So why do this now? For starters, there is not much available research on this trend in the industry that offers a single source of information for entrepreneurs & developers to more easily access financing.

1118913153390321664.text: 4/ There are at least 29 protocols offering ecosystem financing across 27 venture funds/accelerators & 20 foundations/grant programs representing ~$2B in assets under management (nearly 50% of $4.5B crypto fund AUM estimated by @visionhill_ in their Q42018 fund landscape report).

1118913152379441152.text: 3/ So I compiled a landscape that includes all of the ecosystem financing options w/ both dilutive sources of capital like venture funds & accelerators and non-dilutive sources of capital like foundations & grant programs.

1118913151070822402.text: 2/ It's likely overlooked because it's a confusing mess of ever-changing information scattered across hundreds of Medium posts, tweets, press releases, websites, & github repositories that are rarely updated.
